version_description:
Version 1.1:
- Change default buttons size
- New DPad control system behavior (dynamic depending on character and state)
- Fix reflection bug on final boss
- Remove backbuffer video option
- Hide controls during ending
- Change default controls layout
- No more DPad flickering
- Better gallery touch experience
- Fix bottom prompts location on iPhone X/XR/XS
- You can now close the pause menu by touching top-left zone (hearts)
